# SeeCSV

This is a simple command line program for viewing CSV files, you can scroll using the arrow keys and exit via `q` or 
`ESC`. An example screenshot is as follows:

```
┏━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━test.csv━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┓
┃adversary_accuracy┃adversary_loss       ┃covariance_error   ┃ei_1_penalty      ┃ei_2_penalty      ┃energy_coe┃

┃0.5341113105924596┃4.6467619502561314e-2┃0.3391903901344616 ┃3.9274223202117935┃1.309784964098215 ┃0.12705239┃
```
